content.en: Thermal transport analysis: Scientists are using advanced algorithms, such as machine learning and neural networks, to study the thermal transport properties of various materials. These algorithms are being used to expand the techniques used to analyze phonon thermal transport, accurately predict lattice thermal conductivity, and model thermal conductivity in complex crystals and disordered solids. By harnessing the power of algorithms, researchers hope to gain a better understanding of how heat is transferred in different materials, which could have important implications for designing more efficient energy systems.
content.da: Termisk transportanalyse: Videnskabsfolk bruger avancerede algoritmer, såsom maskinlæring og neurale netværk, til at studere de termiske transportegenskaber i forskellige materialer. Disse algoritmer bruges til at udvide de teknikker, der anvendes til at analysere fonontermisk transport, præcist forudsige gittertermisk ledningsevne og modellere termisk ledningsevne i komplekse krystaller og uordnede faste stoffer. Ved at udnytte algoritmernes kraft håber forskere på at opnå en bedre forståelse af, hvordan varme overføres i forskellige materialer, hvilket kan have vigtige implikationer for design af mere effektive energisystemer.
